NK040(thi)056:1: // gcod kyis me mchod gsal byed me'i pa tra bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)056:2: bla ma dang yum chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)056:3: gcod kyis me mchod skabs su mkho ba'i zin bris la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)056:7: tshom bu bkod phyi nang gsang sum gyis mchod pa bshams /
NK040(thi)056:8: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i mngon rtog gzhung srong zhing /
NK040(thi)056:9: bskang ba tshogs mchod dang bcas pa tshang bar byed /
NK040(thi)056:10: gnyis pa las kyi dkyil 'khor la gsum ste /
NK040(thi)056:16: man+dala gru bzhi mda' gang pa byas la /
NK040(thi)056:18: thod pa'i nang du dgra gdon gang yin gyi ling+ga dang /
NK040(thi)056:19: lcags bcug la 'gugs 'dren mang du byas la spa'o //
NK040(thi)056:20: mdor pa kun dga' dpal gyi bzhed pa ltar /
NK040(thi)056:21: las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bri thabs ni /
NK040(thi)056:22: dang po zhi pa'i sbyin sreg byed na /
NK040(thi)056:23: zhi ba'i thabs khung kha dog dkar la dbyib zlum po /
NK040(thi)056:24: rgyar khru gang zabs su khru phyed pa la kha khyer la sor bzhi bskyed pa'i steng du /
NK040(thi)056:25: mu ran sor bzhi pa la /
NK040(thi)056:26: mtshams bzhir rdo rje'i phreng ba phyogs bzhir zla phyed rdo rje'i mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)056:27: de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi phyogs mtshon bri'o //
NK040(thi)056:28: rgyas pa la gru bzhi ser po /
NK040(thi)056:30: zab tu khru gang pa kha khyer dang mu ran sor brgyad pa las /
NK040(thi)056:31: nor bu rin po che'i phreng bas mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)056:32: de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi phyogs mtshon bri'o //
NK040(thi)056:33: dbang la zla gam dmar po /
NK040(thi)056:34: rgyar khru gang zabs su khru phyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:35: mu ran dang kha khyer la sor bzhi bzhi'o //
NK040(thi)056:36: mu ran la lcags kyu lta bu'am pad+ma'i phreng ba /
NK040(thi)056:37: de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi phyogs mtshon no //
NK040(thi)056:38: drag po la gru gsum nag po /
NK040(thi)056:41: kha khyer dang mu ran sor gsum gsum pa la /
NK040(thi)056:42: rdo rje gdeng ba'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:43: de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi phyogs mtshon bri'o //
NK040(thi)056:44: yang na ni zhi ba la mu khyud dkar po zlum po'i nang du /
NK040(thi)056:46: rgyas pa la gru bzhi ser po'i nang du pad+ma
NK040(thi)056:47: 'dab bzhi dbang la mu khyud dmar po'i nang du
NK040(thi)056:48: pad+ma 'dab bzhi / drag po la mu khyud gru
NK040(thi)056:49: gsum dmar po'i nang du pad+ma 'dab bzhi phyogs mtshon
NK040(thi)056:50: pad+ma 'dab bzhi / bri'o // de rnams kun gyi
NK040(thi)056:51: rgyab tu rdo rje dkar po'i phreng ba dang me
NK040(thi)056:52: ri dmar pos bskor bar bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:53: de rnams gang ltar yin kyang me thabs brtsig lugs ni /
NK040(thi)056:54: las bzhi rang rang gi shing gis zhi ba la
NK040(thi)056:55: shing drug gis zlum po drug bskor la mtho dman
NK040(thi)056:57: rgyas pa la shing bzhi bskor du brtsigs la mtho dman gong dang 'dra /
NK040(thi)056:58: dbang la shing lngas zla gam du brtsig la mtho dman gong dang 'dra /
NK040(thi)056:59: drag po la shing gsum gyi gru gsum du brtsig la mtho dman gong ltar yang na ni /
NK040(thi)056:60: o rgyan pad+mas dam pa rgya gar la gsung pa'i gcod kyi las bzhi lhun grub tu byed na /
NK040(thi)056:62: dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi phyogs mtshon no //
NK040(thi)056:63: de rgyab tu chos 'byung gru gsum kha dog sngon po'am nag po bya /
NK040(thi)056:64: de rgyab zla gam dmar po /
NK040(thi)056:65: de rgyab mu khyud zlum po dkar po bya /
NK040(thi)056:66: de rgyab gru bzhi ser po bya /
NK040(thi)056:67: de rgyab sgo 'dog byas na bsod nams che gsung /
NK040(thi)056:69: rdo ra me ris bskor ro //
NK040(thi)056:70: de'i lte bar h+r+ai ma pad+ma 'dab bzhi la ha ri ni sa bzhi bri /
NK040(thi)056:71: chos 'byung gis rgyab zla gam gsum gyi steng du ram drug bri'o //
NK040(thi)056:72: de'i me thabs brtsigs lugs ni /
NK040(thi)056:73: las bzhi'i shing chos 'byung bsnol mar brtsig /
NK040(thi)056:74: de'i mthar shing rtsi sna tshogs kyis bskor /
NK040(thi)056:75: de'i mthar mchod pa rnams lngas bskor ro //
NK040(thi)056:76: de'i steng du dar dmar po'i mda' dar btsug go //
NK040(thi)056:77: de nas mchod pa'i yo byad ni /
NK040(thi)056:80: gtor ma dang bcas pa g.yas su bshams /
NK040(thi)056:91: rang gi rdzas la bung bskyed la g.yon du bshams /
NK040(thi)056:96: zho chang mar khu'i tshogs rnams mdun du bshams /
NK040(thi)056:97: smyon pa'am nad pa 'dre gdon can gyi don du sbyin sreg blug na /
NK040(thi)056:98: liing+ga dang gtor chung brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bzhag /
NK040(thi)056:99: bsdu na nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:100: de ni sbyor ba bcas kyi rin pa'o //
NK040(thi)056:102: dang po las bzhi'i bsnyen pa byed pa /
NK040(thi)056:104: gsum pa mchod pa byin rlabs dang /
NK040(thi)056:105: bzhi pa 'jig rten pa'i me lha bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:106: lnga pa ye shes kyi me lha bskyed pa'o //
NK040(thi)056:107: dang po ni bskang ba tshogs dang bcas pa tshar ba'i rjes su /
NK040(thi)056:108: rang nyid yi dam du bsgom zhing /
NK040(thi)056:109: mdun gyis nam mkhar yang las gzhi'i lha tshogs rnams bsgom la /
NK040(thi)056:110: las bzhi'i dmigs pa 'phro 'du byed cing de'i sngags ni /
NK040(thi)056:111: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni bam ha ri
NK040(thi)056:112: ni sa shan+tim push+tim pa sham ma ra ya rbad
NK040(thi)056:113: / ces pas las bzhi'i bsnyen pa'o //
NK040(thi)056:116: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs //
NK040(thi)056:119: rdo rje mkha' 'gro khros pas pa'i //
NK040(thi)056:120: rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshon cha yi //
NK040(thi)056:121: lus ngag yid gsum brdul du bzlog /
NK040(thi)056:124: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs //
NK040(thi)056:125: gnas 'dir gal te sangs rgyas 'khor lo lus ngag bud+d+ha d+aak+ki h'u /
NK040(thi)056:126: nyon cig gnas 'dir gal te rin chen rin chen lus ngag yid rat+na d+aak+ki ni h'u phata /
NK040(thi)056:128: nyon cig gnas 'dir gal te pad+ma mkha' 'gro me dpung 'bar lus ngag yid pad+ma h'u /
NK040(thi)056:129: nyon cig gnas 'dir gal te las kyi ral gri lus ngag yid karma d+aak+ki ni h'u phata /
NK040(thi)056:131: srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang //
NK040(thi)056:132: na rag dmyal khams yan chad du //
NK040(thi)056:133: log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK040(thi)056:136: ces brjod nas bgegs med par byas /
NK040(thi)056:138: steng yang rdo rje'i bla re la //
NK040(thi)056:139: 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i ste //
NK040(thi)056:140: steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje 'bar bas bstam //
NK040(thi)056:141: rdo rje'i mtshams la ma 'da' zhig /
NK040(thi)056:142: badz+ra rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u phata phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:144: steng yang 'khor lo'i bla 'og kyang steng 'og 'khor lo'i tsakra rak+sha h'u /
NK040(thi)056:145: steng yang dbyug pa'i 'og kyang steng 'og dbyug pa'i tan+t+ra h'u /
NK040(thi)056:146: steng yang dgra s+t+wa'i 'og kyang steng 'og dgra s+t+wa'i pa ra shu h'u /
NK040(thi)056:147: steng yang ral gri'i 'og kyang steng 'og ral gri'i kha kh+aa h'u /
NK040(thi)056:149: bdud dpung nges par sreg mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)056:150: sa dang nam mkha' gang ba yi //
NK040(thi)056:151: 'bar ba me yi phung por gyur //
NK040(thi)056:153: badz+ra dz+wa la rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:154: badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK040(thi)056:155: de nas gnas dang yo byad byin gyis rlabs pa ni /
NK040(thi)056:156: swa b+ha wa stong par gyur /
NK040(thi)056:157: stong pa'i ngang las las lha rdzas las grub pa'i
NK040(thi)056:158: gzhal yas khang gis phyi nang kun tu a las
NK040(thi)056:159: ye shes kyi ka pa la yangs shing rgya che
NK040(thi)056:160: ba'i nang du / +aahmh'u gsum zhu ba las lha rdzas las grub pa'i mchod yon /
NK040(thi)056:167: rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK040(thi)056:168: kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa las byung
NK040(thi)056:169: ba'i mchod sprin bsam gyi mi khyab par /
NK040(thi)056:170: ma h+aa gu ru d+aak+ki ni ar+g+ham pra ti dza ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:173: push+pe a lo g+han+d+he nee bi d+ye shap+da +aa h'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:174: badz+ra g+han+d+he ra ni ta pra ra ni ta sam pra ra ni ta /
NK040(thi)056:177: pra dz+ny+aa pa ra mi ta /
NK040(thi)056:178: na ta sam b+ha we ta /
NK040(thi)056:179: badz+ra d+harma h+r+ai d+ha ya ni /
NK040(thi)056:180: san+to sha ni h'u h'u h'u /
NK040(thi)056:181: he ho ho a kham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:182: bzhi me lha bskyed pa la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)056:186: badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK040(thi)056:187: swa b+ha wa stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK040(thi)056:188: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma ram las nyi ma'i steng du /
NK040(thi)056:189: h'u dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zhi ba'i
NK040(thi)056:190: thab khung zlum po dkar po rgyar khru gang zabs
NK040(thi)056:192: kha khyer sor bzhi bskyed pa'i steng du mu ran sor bzhi pa la /
NK040(thi)056:193: phyogs bzhir rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /
NK040(thi)056:194: grwa bzhir zla phyed rdo rjes mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)056:195: rgyas pa la gru bzhi ser po /
NK040(thi)056:196: rgyar khru do zabs su khru gang pa /
NK040(thi)056:197: kha khyer dang mu ran sor brgyad pa la /
NK040(thi)056:198: rin po che'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:199: dbang la zla gam dmar po /
NK040(thi)056:202: sor bzhi'i kha khyer dang mu ran la /
NK040(thi)056:203: lcags kyu'am pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:204: drag po la gru gsum nag po rgyar sor mo nyi shu /
NK040(thi)056:206: kha khyer mu ran sor gsum pa las rdo rje gdeng po'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:207: rang rang gi da shing gis brtsig pas yongs su gang ba /
NK040(thi)056:208: dwangs zhing thog ma med par gyur /
NK040(thi)056:209: de lta bu'i thabs khung gi nang du /
NK040(thi)056:210: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma ram las nyi ma'i steng du /
NK040(thi)056:211: ram las bsgrang phreng ram gyis mtshan pa las /
NK040(thi)056:212: me lha sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
NK040(thi)056:213: g.yas pa gnyis kyi mchod sbyin dang bsgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
NK040(thi)056:214: g.yon pa gnyis kyis dbyug gu rtse gsum pa dang /
NK040(thi)056:215: bdud rtsi'i gang ba'i ril ba bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)056:219: ra skyes khams pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)056:220: drang srong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK040(thi)056:221: las bzhi sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'phro ba /
NK040(thi)056:222: de dag thams cad kyis spyi bor /
NK040(thi)056:224: de'i 'od kyis shar lho nas me lha 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs bar bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)056:227: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK040(thi)056:228: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
NK040(thi)056:229: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK040(thi)056:230: bsreg blug zhal zas bzhes slad du //
NK040(thi)056:231: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
NK040(thi)056:232: e h+ya hi b+ha ga wan ag ne ye a kar+sha ya sa ma ya stam /
NK040(thi)056:233: ye shes sems dpa' dang dam tshig pa gnyis med du bstim /
NK040(thi)056:234: de nas phyi'i mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:235: me lha drang srong 'khor bcas la //
NK040(thi)056:236: lha rdzas phyi mchod 'bul ba ni //
NK040(thi)056:237: me tog bdug spos mar me dri //
NK040(thi)056:238: bshos gtsang sil snyan rol mo rnams //
NK040(thi)056:239: spyan shang thugs ka sku lus dang //
NK040(thi)056:240: zhal dang snyan du thim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)056:242: nang mchod rnam lnga 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:243: tshil chen bdug spos zhun chen mar me dang //
NK040(thi)056:244: rang byung dri chen zhal zas dang //
NK040(thi)056:245: rkang gling thod pa'i rnga sgra rnams //
NK040(thi)056:246: me lha drang srong 'khor bcas la //
NK040(thi)056:247: mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)056:248: dbang dang dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NK040(thi)056:249: ag+ne ye bdud rtsi lnga la kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)056:251: de nas sreg rdzas cha gcig bzung la /
NK040(thi)056:252: ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK040(thi)056:253: me lha drang srong 'khor bcas la //
NK040(thi)056:255: phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub tu gsol //
NK040(thi)056:256: ag+ne ye dz+wa la ram kh+h+ai /
NK040(thi)056:257: shan+tim push+tim pa shang ku ru r+n+ri tri sha trum
NK040(thi)056:258: ma ra ya h'u phata ces sogs nyer gcig gam
NK040(thi)056:260: phyi nang rnam lnga sngags kyis 'bul /
NK040(thi)056:262: 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog gi sras //
NK040(thi)056:263: lo ka'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas //
NK040(thi)056:264: shes rab mchog gi nyon mongs thams cad sreg /
NK040(thi)056:265: 'jig rten me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud //
NK040(thi)056:266: de nas 'jig rten gyi me lha des song /
NK040(thi)056:267: lnga pa ye shes kyi me lha bskyed pa de la lnga ste /
NK040(thi)056:268: dang po shar gyis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg /
NK040(thi)056:269: gnyis pa lhor rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg /
NK040(thi)056:270: gsum pa nub tu dbang gis sbyin sreg /
NK040(thi)056:271: bzhi pa byang drag po'i sbyin sreg /
NK040(thi)056:272: lnga pa dbus lhun grub kyi sbyin sreg go //
NK040(thi)056:273: dang po ni me lha'i lto bar ye shes pa'i me lha bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)056:274: badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li swa b+ha wa stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK040(thi)056:275: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma /
NK040(thi)056:276: ram las nyi ma'i steng du h'u las sna tshogs rdo rje shar dkar /
NK040(thi)056:280: lte ba sngon po h'u gis mtshan pa las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)056:282: tha ma rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
NK040(thi)056:283: dra ba steng rdo rje'i gur dang bla re de
NK040(thi)056:284: dag gis phyi rol du mad'i d+r+wa ba dang mig
NK040(thi)056:285: mang ris su bris pa'i phyi rol du ye shes
NK040(thi)056:286: kyi me 'bar bas bskor ba'i bsrung 'khor yangs shing
NK040(thi)056:287: rgya che ba / badz+ra rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u h'u phata phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:288: de'i nang du e las chos kyi 'byung gnas /
NK040(thi)056:289: gru gsum phyi dkar la nang dmar ba /
NK040(thi)056:290: gdeng ka chen po gyen du phyogs pa /
NK040(thi)056:291: rtsa ba phra ba thur du zug pa'i nang du /
NK040(thi)056:296: de'i steng du sum las ri rab kyi steng du
NK040(thi)056:297: b+h+r+aum las rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i
NK040(thi)056:298: gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi kha khyer bzhi
NK040(thi)056:299: dang bcas pa'i nang nas rim pa bzhin du /
NK040(thi)056:304: dkar po'i brtsig pa rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK040(thi)056:305: rtsig pa'i steng du rin po che pha gu ser po la /
NK040(thi)056:306: d+r+wa ba dang d+r+wa ba phyed pa 'phyang pa'i steng du /
NK040(thi)056:307: rin po che'i rnam par spel ba'i mda' yab dang /
NK040(thi)056:308: pu shu mchod rten gyi rnam pas mdzes par byas pa /
NK040(thi)056:309: rtsig pa'i phyi rol du 'dod yon gyi snam bu
NK040(thi)056:310: dmar po la mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug gis
NK040(thi)056:311: mchod rdzas du ma thog nas bcom ldan 'das ma
NK040(thi)056:312: la mchod pa / nang ka ba brgyad kyis brteg pa /
NK040(thi)056:313: rdo rje'i gdung bzhis mig mang ris su bris shing
NK040(thi)056:314: mdzes par phub pa'i dbus phyur bu zlum por gyur
NK040(thi)056:315: pa'i steng du / rdo rje phyed pa nor bu rin po che'i mtshan pa /
NK040(thi)056:316: sgo bzhi bzhi'i thad sor ka ba bzhi bzhis btegs
NK040(thi)056:317: pa'i rta bab bang rim bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa'i
NK040(thi)056:318: steng du / pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
NK040(thi)056:323: me tog gis phreng ba dang /
NK040(thi)056:325: rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can la sogs pa rgyan du mas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:326: ngang zhing sgrib pa med pa'i phyi rol du /
NK040(thi)056:327: dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus sngo /
NK040(thi)056:330: byang ljang dbus pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i lte ba dang /
NK040(thi)056:331: 'dab ma rnams su a las zla ba ram las nyi ma /
NK040(thi)056:332: ro'i gdan steng dbus su +aa yig sngon po /
NK040(thi)056:336: byang ljang khu de rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
NK040(thi)056:337: dbus su rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog sngon mo /
NK040(thi)056:338: gri gug rang rang gi mdog can a yig gis
NK040(thi)056:339: mtshan pa las 'od 'phros sems can gyi don byas
NK040(thi)056:340: 'phags pa mchod tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las
NK040(thi)056:341: / dbus su rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog sngon mo /
NK040(thi)056:342: shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkar mo /
NK040(thi)056:346: thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum cung zad bsgrad pa /
NK040(thi)056:347: zhal cung zad gdang zhing mche ba gtsig pa /
NK040(thi)056:348: dbu skra nag po sil mar gyur pas sku rgyab non pa /
NK040(thi)056:349: g.yas pas gri khug nam mkhar phyar ba /
NK040(thi)056:350: g.yon pas thod khrag thugs kar bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)056:351: gru mo na kha t+w+aam kha yod pa /
NK040(thi)056:353: dung chen gyis phreng ba mchod phyir thog pa /
NK040(thi)056:354: mi mgo skam po lnga lngas dbu brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:355: rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa /
NK040(thi)056:356: 'khor lo rna cha gadu'u mgul rgyan sku reg ste rus pa'i rgyan lngas brgyan pa /
NK040(thi)056:357: zhabs g.yas bskum pa'i ting pa ba ga la gtad cing /
NK040(thi)056:358: g.yon brkyang pa gar thabs kyi ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)056:359: dang zhing gsal ba la nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi brjid can /
NK040(thi)056:360: ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i dbus su bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)056:361: de dag thams cad kyis dpral bar /
NK040(thi)056:363: ma h+aa gu ru d+aak+ki ni sa pa ri wa ra badz+ra sa ma ya dza dza /
NK040(thi)056:364: pad+ma ka ma la ye stam /
NK040(thi)056:367: ma h+aa gu ru +aa gu sha dza /
NK040(thi)056:370: badz+ra a be sha ya +aah yang thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas dbang gis lha /
NK040(thi)056:376: pan tsa ku la sa pa ri wa ra /
NK040(thi)056:378: pad+ma ka ma la ye s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)056:379: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa pa ri wa ar+g+ham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:380: des bdag la dbang bskur du gsol /
NK040(thi)056:381: ji ltar bltam pa tsam gyis ni /
NK040(thi)056:382: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar /
NK040(thi)056:383: lha'i chu ni dag pa yi /
NK040(thi)056:384: de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol /
NK040(thi)056:385: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka te sa ma ya sh+ri ye h'u /
NK040(thi)056:386: ces gsung zhing dbang bskur bas /
NK040(thi)056:388: dbang thams cad thob nas lus thams cad gang /
NK040(thi)056:389: chu'i lhag ma yar lud pa las /
NK040(thi)056:390: gtso mo la mi bskyod pa /
NK040(thi)056:391: gzhan rnams la rigs bzhis dbus rgyan /
NK040(thi)056:392: yang na mi spyod pas dbu rgyan /
NK040(thi)056:393: ar+g+ham de nas ye shes pa spyan drangs pa ni /
NK040(thi)056:394: gnas mkha' dbyings rnam dag gis pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)056:395: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum //
NK040(thi)056:396: chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku //
NK040(thi)056:397: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum //
NK040(thi)056:398: khyed sangs rgyas byang sems tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)056:400: bzhugs nas dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)056:401: gnas 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)056:402: yum chen phar phyin man chad dang //
NK040(thi)056:403: rtsa ba'i bla ma yan chad kyis //
NK040(thi)056:404: ma rgyud dpa' mo'i lha tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)056:405: khyed dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK040(thi)056:406: gnas 'dir spyan bzhugs nas gnas bya rgod phung po'i ri bo nas //
NK040(thi)056:407: bcom ldan sh+aakya thub pa dang //
NK040(thi)056:408: rtsa ba'i bla ma pha brgyud dpa' bo'i lha tshogs la //
NK040(thi)056:409: dpa' mo mkha' 'gro'i gnas 'dir bzhugs nas gnas bkra shis glang lung gi dgon pa nas //
NK040(thi)056:410: rgyal ba don 'grub man chad dang //
NK040(thi)056:411: rtsa ba brgyud pa'i sras rgyud nyams myong gis sde
NK040(thi)056:412: snod rgyud sde'i bla ma rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs gnas
NK040(thi)056:413: gar bzhugs dag pa'i zhing khams nas /
NK040(thi)056:414: pha drin chen rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang /
NK040(thi)056:415: khyed bka' brgyud bla ma'i tshogs kyis gnas 'dir bzhugs nas gnas gnyan sa ri khrod dgon pa nas //
NK040(thi)056:416: grog snyem thag chod pa sprul pa'i sku //
NK040(thi)056:417: skal ldan pho mo'i tshogs kyis bskor //
NK040(thi)056:418: gnas bzhugs gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas mchog nas //
NK040(thi)056:419: yi dam lha tshogs rgyud sde bzhi'i tshogs kyis gnas bzhugs bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)056:420: chos skyong ma mgon lcam dral la //
NK040(thi)056:421: dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyi gnas 'dir bzhugs ma
NK040(thi)056:422: h+aa gu ru d+aak+ki ni sa pa ri wa ra
NK040(thi)056:423: badz+ra sa ma ya dza dza /
NK040(thi)056:424: ces brjod cing rdo rje bsdus pa'i phyag rgya byas la thams cad mdun du byon par bsam /
NK040(thi)056:425: pad+ma ka ma la ye s+t+wam /
NK040(thi)056:426: ma h+aa gu ru ces sogs sngon du 'gro ba ma sogs pas mchod nas /
NK040(thi)056:427: dzahmh'u bam hoh de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:428: dang po spyi mchod pa rnam lnga /
NK040(thi)056:430: de nas nang mchod 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:431: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta a mri ta badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK040(thi)056:433: de nas gsang mchod 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:434: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta a nu ra ga na badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK040(thi)056:436: de nas de kho na nyid kyis mchod pa ni /
NK040(thi)056:438: de nas thog ma mar la tha ma mar //
NK040(thi)056:439: ces pas mar chos nyid kyis ngo bor dmigs la 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:442: de nas sreg rdzas bzung la /
NK040(thi)056:444: ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK040(thi)056:445: bla ma yid dam mkha' 'gro la //
NK040(thi)056:447: phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub tu gsol //
NK040(thi)056:448: nad dang sdug bsngal zhi gyur cig /
NK040(thi)056:449: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni bam ha ri ni sa dz+wa la ram /
NK040(thi)056:451: nad gdon sdig sgrib 'jig brgyad thams cad shan+tim ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:454: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dkar po bsam la /
NK040(thi)056:455: lha tshogs rnams sku mdog dkar por gyur pa la phul bas /
NK040(thi)056:456: mnyes shing dgyes pa'i yon tan gyis /
NK040(thi)056:457: lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer dkar po ma ra 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)056:458: bdag dang yon bdag gis 'jigs pa brgyad zhi bar bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)056:460: rang gis lag pa'i sor mo lnga 'dod yon gyis
NK040(thi)056:461: lha mo lngar bsam la brgya rtsa brgyad 'bul lo
NK040(thi)056:462: // des mar 'bul de nas yam shing /
NK040(thi)056:463: bo d+hi prik+sha ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:465: de nas gtang rag gis mchod pa ni /
NK040(thi)056:466: phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod pa gong ltar 'bul /
NK040(thi)056:467: de nas bstod pa bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:468: ma chos dbyings rnam dag skye med yum /
NK040(thi)056:470: ma drin mo che la phyag 'tshal bstod /
NK040(thi)056:473: wak+ka badz+ra +aah tsit+ta badz+ra sid+d+hi h'u /
NK040(thi)056:476: ma 'byor pa dang nyams pa dang /
NK040(thi)056:478: de nas yi ge brgya pa sa lhag chad kyi kha bskang /
NK040(thi)056:480: na mo bdag gzhan kun gyi dus gsum du //
NK040(thi)056:482: de bzhin zag bcas zag pa med //
NK040(thi)056:483: de dag la ni yi rang ngo //
NK040(thi)056:484: yi rang byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK040(thi)056:485: tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam //
NK040(thi)056:486: mthong ba'i lam dang sgom pa'i lam //
NK040(thi)056:487: bla na med pa'i khyad par lam //
NK040(thi)056:488: bar chad med par 'jug par shog /
NK040(thi)056:489: bar chad med par 'jug nas kyang //
NK040(thi)056:490: ji srid 'khor ba ma stong par //
NK040(thi)056:491: stong nyid dam pa thob par shog /
NK040(thi)056:493: bcom ldan sh+aakya thub pa yis //
NK040(thi)056:494: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
NK040(thi)056:495: lam bsgrod byang chub mchog thob pas //
NK040(thi)056:496: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
NK040(thi)056:497: skye ba med la gzugs sku 'char //
NK040(thi)056:498: 'gro rnams bde la bkod mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)056:499: yum chen pha rol phyin ma'i bkra shig shog /
NK040(thi)056:500: tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi //
NK040(thi)056:501: mchod pa'i tshogs kyi rab mchod cing //
NK040(thi)056:502: nyin mtshan kun tu bsrung byed pa'i //
NK040(thi)056:503: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
NK040(thi)056:505: gnyis pa lhor rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni /
NK040(thi)056:507: gnyis pa mchod pa byin rlabs /
NK040(thi)056:508: gsum pa rgyas pa'i me thab bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:509: bzhi pa 'jig rten pa'i me lha gsal gdab cing /
NK040(thi)056:510: lnga pa ye shes kyi me lha bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:511: spyan drangs pa sogs pa rnams gong ltar du rgyas par byed do //
NK040(thi)056:512: yang na skad cig dran rdzogs bskyed cing bsdus kyang rung ngo //
NK040(thi)056:513: de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:514: phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod pa gang bzhin 'bul /
NK040(thi)056:515: de nas mar gong bzhin du 'bul /
NK040(thi)056:516: de nas sreg rdzas 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:517: ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK040(thi)056:518: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la //
NK040(thi)056:520: phrin las rnams bzhi bsgrub tu gsol //
NK040(thi)056:521: tshe dang bsod nams rgyas gyur cig /
NK040(thi)056:522: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni tshe dang bsod
NK040(thi)056:523: nams la sogs 'byor pa drug push+tim ku ru ye
NK040(thi)056:524: s+w+aa h+aa / de'i dmigs pa ni /
NK040(thi)056:525: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi ser po byin gyis rlabs la /
NK040(thi)056:526: lha tshogs rnams sku mdog ser por gyur pa las phul bas /
NK040(thi)056:527: mnyes shing dgyes pa'i 'od zer gyis /
NK040(thi)056:528: lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer phar 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)056:529: bdag dang yon bdag gis tshe dang bsod nams la sogs 'byor pa drug rgyas par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)056:531: de nas yang mar dang yam shing yang gong ltar 'bul lo //
NK040(thi)056:532: gtang rag gi mchod pa gang ltar byed /
NK040(thi)056:533: de nas dngos grub len pa /
NK040(thi)056:535: lhag chad kha bskang smon lam bkra shis dang bcas pa gong ltar bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:536: de nas gsum pa nub tu dbang gis sbyin bsreg ni /
NK040(thi)056:538: mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa /
NK040(thi)056:539: dbang gis me thabs bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:541: ye shes kyi lha bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:543: phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod pa mar dang bcas pa 'bul ba ni gong ltar ro //
NK040(thi)056:544: de nas sbyin sreg rdzas 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:545: ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK040(thi)056:546: bla ma yi dam 'dod yon phrin las mi nor zas gsum bsdus gyur cig /
NK040(thi)056:547: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni /
NK040(thi)056:548: khams gsum srid gsum lha 'dre mi gsum thams cad pa sham ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)056:550: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dmar por bsam la 'bul bas /
NK040(thi)056:551: mnyes zhing dgyes pa'i 'od zer gyis /
NK040(thi)056:552: lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer dmar
NK040(thi)056:553: po 'phros pas khams gsum srid pa gsum gyi lha
NK040(thi)056:554: 'dre mi gsum thams cad dbang du bsdus par bsam
NK040(thi)056:556: de nas mar dang yam shing /
NK040(thi)056:562: smon lam bkra shis dang bcas pa gong ltar bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:563: de nas bzhi pa byang du drag po'i sbyin sreg ni /
NK040(thi)056:565: mchod pa byin gyis rlabs pa /
NK040(thi)056:566: drag po'i me thab bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:568: ye shes kyi mi lha bskyed pa /
NK040(thi)056:570: phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod pa mar dang bcas pa 'bul ba ni gang ltar ro //
NK040(thi)056:571: de nas sreg rdzas 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:572: ye shes me yi bla ma yi dam 'dod yon
NK040(thi)056:573: phrin las dgra bgegs thams cad phung zhing sgrol gyur
NK040(thi)056:574: cig / +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni dgra
NK040(thi)056:575: bgegs gnod byed thams cad r+n+ri tri sha trum ma
NK040(thi)056:578: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi mthing nag du bsam la /
NK040(thi)056:579: lha tshogs rnams sku mdog mthing nag tu gyur par bsam la phul bas /
NK040(thi)056:580: mnyes shing dgyes pa'i yon tan gyis /
NK040(thi)056:581: lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer mthing nag 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)056:582: bdag dang yon bdag gis dgra 'dre gdon gsum thams cad brlag par bsam la gong ltar ro //
NK040(thi)056:583: khyad par du nad pa yod na gong gi gtor
NK040(thi)056:584: chung dang ling+ga la 'gugs bzhugs mang du byas la
NK040(thi)056:585: / ling+ga gdon bgegs dngos su bsam la /
NK040(thi)056:586: lha tshogs rnams kyi zhal du 'bul bar bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)056:587: gtor chung yang ye shes kyi me dpung du bsam la /
NK040(thi)056:588: gdon bgegs rnam bsreg par bsam la sngags tshar re dang ling+ga re sprad la 'bul lo //
NK040(thi)056:589: de nas mar dang yam shing /
NK040(thi)056:591: bstod pa dngos grub len pa /
NK040(thi)056:594: smon lam bkra shis dang bcas pa gong ltar ro //
NK040(thi)056:595: lnga pa lhun grub kyi sbyin sreg ni /
NK040(thi)056:598: me thab ni las bzhi lhun grub kyis me thab ltar bskyed la /
NK040(thi)056:599: 'jig rten gyi me lha ni smug por bskyed la /
NK040(thi)056:600: ye shes kyi me lha rang gis mdog ltar bskyed la /
NK040(thi)056:602: phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod pa mar dang bcas pa 'bul ba ni gong ltar ro //
NK040(thi)056:603: de nas sreg bardzasa 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:604: ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK040(thi)056:605: bla ma yi 'dod yon phrin las +aahmh'u gu ru
NK040(thi)056:606: d+he wa d+aak+ki ni shan+tim push+tim pa shang r+n+ri tri
NK040(thi)056:607: sha trum ma ra ya phata /
NK040(thi)056:610: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi kha dog sna lngar bsam la /
NK040(thi)056:611: lha tshogs rnams la phul bas /
NK040(thi)056:612: mnyes shing dgyes pa'i yon tan gyis /
NK040(thi)056:613: lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)056:614: bdag dang yon tan bdag gis las bzhi'i don sgrub par bsam /
NK040(thi)056:616: de nas mar dang yam shing /
NK040(thi)056:622: smon lam bkra shis dang bcas pa gong ltar bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:630: sdig bskul gyis me zhags brgyab par bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:631: de nas ye shes kyi me lha gshegs /
NK040(thi)056:632: dam tshig me lha bdag la bsdu /
NK040(thi)056:633: 'jig rten gyi me lha rang gis gnas su gshegs /
NK040(thi)056:634: de nas bro brdung ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:635: me gzhi bskor te 'cham thab bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:636: bro 'di gang dang gang gis bro //
NK040(thi)056:637: bro 'di pha brgyud dpa' bo'i bro //
NK040(thi)056:638: pha brgyud dpa' bo'i bro brdung pas //
NK040(thi)056:639: phyi stong nyid ngang du zangs se zang //
NK040(thi)056:640: bar mnyam nyid ngang du phri li li //
NK040(thi)056:641: nang ye shes ngang du ya la la //
NK040(thi)056:642: gdon 'dre bgegs kyi mgo der chems se chem //
NK040(thi)056:643: bro 'di gang dang gang gi bro //
NK040(thi)056:644: bro 'di ma brgyud dpa' mo'i bro //
NK040(thi)056:645: ma rgyud dpa' mo'i bro brdung pas //
NK040(thi)056:646: phyi stong nyid bar mnyam nyid nang ye shes gdon
NK040(thi)056:647: 'dre bro 'di bro 'di sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i bro
NK040(thi)056:648: // sangs rgyas mkha' phyi stong nyid bar mnyam nang
NK040(thi)056:649: ye shes gdon 'dre bro 'di gang bro 'di mkha'
NK040(thi)056:651: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i bro brdung pas //
NK040(thi)056:652: phyi stong nyid bar mnyam nyid nang ye shes ngang du ya la la //
NK040(thi)056:653: gdon 'dre bgegs kyis mgo der chems se chem //
NK040(thi)056:654: de yan chad dngos gzhi de song nas /
NK040(thi)056:655: spyi don gsum pa rjes kyi bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)056:656: lhag ma la sogs spyi dkyus ltar bya'o //
NK040(thi)056:657: sbyin sreg 'di ni slob dpon pad+mas dam pa rgya gar la gnang ba'i gcod kyis me mchod dang /
NK040(thi)056:658: zab don thugs thig gi me mchod dang /
NK040(thi)056:659: 'dor pa kun dga' dpal bas mdzad pa'i me mchod dang la brten nas /
NK040(thi)056:660: gcod kyis me mchod gsal byed me'i pa tra zhes bya ba 'di /
NK040(thi)056:662: ri mo nam mched brgyad kyi zhol /
NK040(thi)056:663: ri tshar chos gling gis ri khrod nas /
NK040(thi)056:664: kah thog pa'i 'bangs kyi tha mal gyur pa'i ku
NK040(thi)056:665: su lu pun+ye la k+shas sbyar ba re zhig rdzogs
